title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti in salted water until al dente.
Fry pancetta until crispy in a pan.
Whisk eggs with cheese and black pepper.
Drain pasta and mix with pancetta, then quickly stir in egg mixture.
Serve immediately with extra cheese and black pepper.
